fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation

Class RandomSplitCrossValidation<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation.RandomSplitCrossValidation<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - samples datatype
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BalancedCrossValidation, CrossValidation

    public class RandomSplitCrossValidation<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CrossValidation, BalancedCrossValidation

    Class for simple random split based cross validation. The list of samples is split random into training and validation sets (using the trainPercent parameter). nbTest evaluation are performed.

    By default, 70% of the samples are used for training, and 20 tests are performed.

    This CV is balanced by default.
    Author:
    picard
